sentences.sContent: an opportunity to view the film before it goes on general release
sentences.sCn: 在影片公映之前观影的机会

sentences.sContent: ...The traditional view of such moments is that they constitute a charming but irrelevant byproduct of youth-something to be pushed aside to make room for more important qualities...
...Do your contacts share your point of view on most subjects...
...This might be a small change to the way we view work and the office...
...We're beginning to see a change in how people view retirement...
...I will discuss the positive and negative effects of this issue and offer my own view on it...
...Those whose accommodation had more natural views showed an improvement of 19%; those who had the same improvement in material surroundings but no nice view improved just 4%...

phrases.pCn: 在视野范围内；在考虑中的；作为目标
着眼于；考虑到；以…为目的
经眼力观察，经表面的观察

words.tran: 无景色的；无意见的；看不见的
观察者；观看者；电视观众；[仪] 指示器

trans.tranOther: to think about something or someone in a particular way
